attributes.action: introduce the use of lie detectors in police interviews and for the evidence to be admissable in court
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I feel that lie detectors should be used on a trial basis in all police interviews to guage if the suspect is being truthfull. This will speed up the process of gathering evidence and give a difinative answer to police questioning. Lie detectors are widely know to be 99% accurate. The evidence should be make admissable as evidence for the prosecution at court. If sucessfull should be made a permanant feature of police work as an additional tool.
